page.title: 01CALDECOTE DESCRIPTION
page.content:
{ { { { CALDECOTE,SMALL {VILLAGE,CAMBRIDGESHIRE } THE VILLAGE IS IN TWO PARTS. THE{CHURCH OF ST.MICHAELS}IS 1.5MILES SOUTH OF THE LARGEST CONCENTRATION OF{ POPULATION.} A FEW OLD HOUSES ARE STRUNG OUT ALONG THE ROAD COMING NORTHWARDS. THEY ARE IN{CALDECOTE}
THEN, COMING UP THE ROAD, WHICH IS BORDERED BY FIELDS, AND SMALL WOODS, YOU ENTER{CALDECOTE HIGHFIELDS,}WHICH IS THE NEWER PART . THE{HIGHFIELDS } PART IS ABOUT 1 MILE LONG. IT IS MADE UP OF THREE ROADS ;WEST DRIVE; MAIN STREET; EAST DRIVE. IT IS ABOUT 0.75 MILES WIDE.
